descriptionHtml:
Backstory: https://www.wattpad.com/story/39821931-the-last-akaviri   ~ My character as a follower. No requirements, just skyrim, of course. Goes great with Akaviri Samurai Armor mod, as I used it when I played as her. Located in Palace of the kings (aka that big castle in windhelm- where ulfric stormcloak lives). I'd enjoy if you read the story, i'm working hard on it...

::::DOES NOT HAVE SKIMPY ARMOR! IM AN 11 YEAR OLD GIRL::::
author: Hawkara1
